Title: Wind Blows in the Meadow
Actors: Hossein Abedini, Elnaz Shaker Doust, Jamal Ejlali, Mohammad Amir Naji
Plot: Shooka, a spirited, hardworking girl from an Iranian mountain village is to be married in an arranged marriage. Shokrollah, her neighbor with Down syndrome, has been head over heels in love...
